quote: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face... we must do that which we think we cannot.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls the most massive characters are seared with scars.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: We can be tired, weary and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
name: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong but sometimes it is letting go.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Does anybody really think that they didn't get what they had because they didn't have the talent or the strength or the endurance or the commitment?
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
name: Plato

quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Don't wish me happiness - I don't expect to be happy it's gotten beyond that, somehow. Wish me courage and strength and a sense of humor - I will need them all.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven't half the strength you think they have.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: What is exciting is not for one person to be stronger than the other... but for two people to have met their match and yet they are equally as stubborn, as obstinate, as passionate, as crazy as the other.
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Because your own strength is unequal to the task, do not assume that it is beyond the powers of man but if anything is within the powers and province of man, believe that it is within your own compass also.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
name: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities strong men make them.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
name: Peter Marshall

quote: When adversity strikes, that's when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.

quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.
name: Robert E. Lee

quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
name: James Dean

quote: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: There are two ways of exerting one's strength: one is pushing down, the other is pulling up.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong.
name: Tecumseh

quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The days of our lives, for all of us, are numbered. We know that. And yes, there are certainly times when we aren't able to muster as much strength and patience as we would like. It's called being human.

quote: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.

quote: I think I was born strong-willed. That's not the kind of thing you can learn. The advantage is, you stick to what you believe in and rarely get pushed out of what you want to do.
name: Joan Jett

quote: Only by contending with challenges that seem to be beyond your strength to handle at the moment you can grow more surely toward the stars.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: Insincerity is always weakness sincerity even in error is strength.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: I learned that it is the weak who are cruel, and that gentleness is to be expected only from the strong.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
name: Marge Piercy

quote: When I use my strength in the service of my vision it makes no difference whether or not I am afraid.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future.
name: Blanka Vlasic

quote: Life only demands from you the strength that you possess. Only one feat is possible not to run away.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged.

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
name: Harriet Tubman

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.

quote: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
name: Tecumseh

quote: I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naive or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman.
name: Anais Nin

quote: One strength of the communist system of the East is that it has some of the character of a religion and inspires the emotions of a religion.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Women are like teabags. We don't know our true strength until we are in hot water!
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: That though the radiance which was once so bright be now forever taken from my sight. Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, glory in the flower. We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
name: Helen Keller

quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire the size of your dream and how you handle disappointment along the way.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.
name: Abdul Kalam

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: The tax on capital gains directly affects investment decisions, the mobility and flow of risk capital... the ease or difficulty experienced by new ventures in obtaining capital, and thereby the strength and potential for growth in the economy.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Women may fall when there's no strength in men.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: It is my own firm belief that the strength of the soul grows in proportion as you subdue the flesh.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
name: Confucius

quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
name: Abdul Kalam

quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
name: George Orwell

quote: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
name: Benjamin Britten

quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
name: John Muir

quote: Simulated disorder postulates perfect discipline simulated fear postulates courage simulated weakness postulates strength.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A nation that destroys its soils destroys itself. Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to our people.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: My strength has the strength of ten because my heart is pure.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide on what to do.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.

quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.

quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.

quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Greatness lies, not in being strong, but in the right using of strength and strength is not used rightly when it serves only to carry a man above his fellows for his own solitary glory. He is the greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: May He who is the Brahman of the Hindus, the Ahura-Mazda of the Zoroastrians, the Buddha of the Buddhists, the Jehovah of the Jews, the Father in Heaven of the Christians give strength to you to carry out your noble idea.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
name: Mattie Stepanek

quote: Youngsters of the age of two and three are endowed with extraordinary strength. They can lift a dog twice their own weight and dump him into the bathtub.

quote: Ronald Reagan was a president of strength. His philosophy was a philosophy of strength - a strong military, a strong economy and strong families.

quote: Give us grace and strength to forbear and to persevere. Give us courage and gaiety and the quiet mind, spare to us our friends, soften to us our enemies.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Where is the man who has the strength to be true, and to show himself as he is?
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.

quote: My greatest strength is common sense. I'm really a standard brand - like Campbell's tomato soup or Baker's chocolate.

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.

quote: I am an example of what is possible when girls from the very beginning of their lives are loved and nurtured by people around them. I was surrounded by extraordinary women in my life who taught me about quiet strength and dignity.

name: Rick Warren

quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.

quote: The strength and power and goodness of America has always been based on the strength and power and goodness of our communities, our families, our faiths. That is the bedrock of what makes America, America. In our best days, we can feel the vibrancy of America's communities, large and small.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: Religion is an illusion and it derives its strength from the fact that it falls in with our instinctual desires.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: If thou desire the love of God and man, be humble, for the proud heart, as it loves none but itself, is beloved of none but itself. Humility enforces where neither virtue, nor strength, nor reason can prevail.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: Atheism shows strength of mind, but only to a certain degree.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: He is greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: A religious man is a person who holds God and man in one thought at one time, at all times, who suffers harm done to others, whose greatest passion is compassion, whose greatest strength is love and defiance of despair.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Wondrous is the strength of cheerfulness, and its power of endurance - the cheerful man will do more in the same time, will do it better, will preserve it longer, than the sad or sullen.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: People do not lack strength they lack will.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Unless India stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.
name: Abdul Kalam

quote: My greatest strength as a consultant is to be ignorant and ask a few questions.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The strength of a man's virtue should not be measured by his special exertions, but by his habitual acts.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: All too often arrogance accompanies strength, and we must never assume that justice is on the side of the strong. The use of power must always be accompanied by moral choice.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The spirit of man is more important than mere physical strength, and the spiritual fiber of a nation than its wealth.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability.
name: Ho Chi Minh

quote: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
name: Charles Kingsley

quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Our real problem, then, is not our strength today it is rather the vital necessity of action today to ensure our strength tomorrow.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: African women in general need to know that it's OK for them to be the way they are - to see the way they are as a strength, and to be liberated from fear and from silence.
name: Wangari Maathai

quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
name: Mike Murdock

quote: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself.
name: Henry Miller

quote: And when a woman's will is as strong as the man's who wants to govern her, half her strength must be concealment.
name: George Eliot

quote: Strength of mind rests in sobriety for this keeps your reason unclouded by passion.
name: Pythagoras

quote: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: We all have enough strength to endure the misfortunes of others.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: When it comes to developing character strength, inner security and unique personal and interpersonal talents and skills in a child, no institution can or ever will compare with, or effectively substitute for, the home's potential for positive influence.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of the effort is the measure of the result.
name: James Allen

quote: We are born weak, we need strength helpless, we need aid foolish, we need reason. All that we lack at birth, all that we need when we come to man's estate, is the gift of education.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
name: Betty Friedan

quote: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Our strength is often composed of the weakness that we're damned if we're going to show.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: One ever feels his twoness - an American, a Negro two souls, two thoughts, two unreconciled strivings two warring ideals in one dark body, whose dogged strength alone keeps it from being torn asunder.
name: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
name: Christopher Reeve

quote: Eccentricity has always abounded when and where strength of character had abounded and the amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and courage which it contained.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
name: Theodor Adorno

quote: Method is more important than strength, when you wish to control your enemies. By dropping golden beads near a snake, a crow once managed To have a passer-by kill the snake for the beads.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Music makes us want to live. You don't know how many times people have told me that they'd been down and depressed and just wanted to die. But then a special song caught their ear and that helped give them renewed strength. That's the power music has.
name: Mary J. Blige

quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: To be capable of steady friendship or lasting love, are the two greatest proofs, not only of goodness of heart, but of strength of mind.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: Whoever knows it also knows that in love there is no More and no Less but that he who loves can only love with the whole heart, and with the whole soul with all his strength and with all his will.
name: Max Muller

quote: All species capable of grasping this fact manage better in the struggle for existence than those which rely upon their own strength alone: the wolf, which hunts in a pack, has a greater chance of survival than the lion, which hunts alone.
name: Christian Lous Lange

quote: Prayer is more than meditation. In meditation, the source of strength is one's self. When one prays, he goes to a source of strength greater than his own.
name: Madame de Stael

quote: 'Tis skill, not strength, that governs a ship.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless.
name: Giacomo Casanova

quote: When I dare to be powerful - to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Many a man's strength is in opposition, and when he faileth, he grows out of use.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I would fight for my liberty so long as my strength lasted, and if the time came for me to go, the Lord would let them take me.
name: Harriet Tubman

quote: The superior man is the providence of the inferior. He is eyes for the blind, strength for the weak, and a shield for the defenseless. He stands erect by bending above the fallen. He rises by lifting others.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: A nation' s strength ultimately consists in what it can do on its own, and not in what it can borrow from others.
name: Indira Gandhi

quote: It is a sign of contraction of the mind when it is content, or of weariness. A spirited mind never stops within itself it is always aspiring and going beyond its strength.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Patience is the support of weakness impatience the ruin of strength.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.
name: Jack Welch

quote: I look at an ant and I see myself: a native South African, endowed by nature with a strength much greater than my size so I might cope with the weight of a racism that crushes my spirit.
name: Miriam Makeba

quote: To have ego means to believe in your own strength. And to also be open to other people's views. It is to be open, not closed. So, yes, my ego is big, but it's also very small in some areas. My ego is responsible for my doing what I do - bad or good.
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: Freedom and order are not incompatible... truth is strength... free discussion is the very life of truth.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
name: Euripides

quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Although men are accused of not knowing their own weakness, yet perhaps few know their own strength. It is in men as in soils, where sometimes there is a vein of gold which the owner knows not of.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I understand now that the vulnerability I've always felt is the greatest strength a person can have. You can't experience life without feeling life. What I've learned is that being vulnerable to somebody you love is not a weakness, it's a strength.
name: Elisabeth Shue

quote: Suppressed grief suffocates, it rages within the breast, and is forced to multiply its strength.
name: Ovid

quote: There comes a pause, for human strength will not endure to dance without cessation and everyone must reach the point at length of absolute prostration.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: Organic buildings are the strength and lightness of the spiders' spinning, buildings qualified by light, bred by native character to environment, married to the ground.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Leaders come in many forms, with many styles and diverse qualities. There are quiet leaders and leaders one can hear in the next county. Some find strength in eloquence, some in judgment, some in courage.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: Mohammed was not an apparent failure. He was a dazzling success, politically as well as spiritually, and Islam went from strength to strength to strength.
name: Karen Armstrong

quote: The financial crisis should not become an excuse to raise taxes, which would only undermine the economic growth required to regain our strength.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Religious beliefs evolved by group-selection, tribe competing against tribe, and the illogic of religions is not a weakness but their essential strength.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: The freedom to fail is vital if you're going to succeed. Most successful people fail from time to time, and it is a measure of their strength that failure merely propels them into some new attempt at success.
name: Michael Korda

quote: In that I found being able to talk to my family about my feelings, praying for strength and realizing that our lives have a deep purpose and the journey of our lives is to find out what that is and express it, was the only way I could have gotten through it.
name: Marlo Thomas

quote: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.
name: J. C. Watts

quote: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure.
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: One column of truth cannot hold an institution of ideas from falling into ignorance. It is wiser that a person of prudence and purpose save his strength for battles that can be won.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: I place no hope in my strength, nor in my works: but all my confidence is in God my protector, who never abandons those who have put all their hope and thought in him.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: Let us speak, though we show all our faults and weaknesses, - for it is a sign of strength to be weak, to know it, and out with it - not in a set way and ostentatiously, though, but incidentally and without premeditation.
name: Herman Melville

quote: The strength of criticism lies in the weakness of the thing criticized.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.
name: George Sand

quote: Life always rides in strength to victory, not through internationalism... but only through the direct responsibility of the individual.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I like a women who's got some balls, some strength. As long as I can beat her at arm wrestling, that's fine.
name: James Hetfield

quote: Strength instead of being the lusty child of passion, grows by grappling with and subduing them.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: Many people think they want things, but they don't really have the strength, the discipline. They are weak. I believe that you get what you want if you want it badly enough.
name: Sophia Loren

quote: The separation of church and state is a source of strength, but the conscience of our nation does not call for separation between men of state and faith in the Supreme Being.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: A key to strengthening spiritual muscles and enduring hardship is finding strength in the Word of God.
name: Walter Martin

quote: In this outward and physical ceremony we attest once again to the inner and spiritual strength of our Nation. As my high school teacher, Miss Julia Coleman, used to say: 'We must adjust to changing times and still hold to unchanging principles.'
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: The depth and strength of a human character are defined by its moral reserves. People reveal themselves completely only when they are thrown out of the customary conditions of their life, for only then do they have to fall back on their reserves.
name: Leon Trotsky

quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort where we overlap.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: The virtue of paganism was strength the virtue of Christianity is obedience.
name: Augustus Hare

quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
name: Hal Borland

quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.
name: Josephine Baker

quote: Our passion is our strength.

quote: Strength is born in the deep silence of long-suffering hearts not amid joy.

quote: From the gut comes the strut, and where hunger reigns, strength abstains.

quote: I have arm-wrestled here and there... guys seem to want to test my strength.

quote: I challenge anybody to say that I wouldn't know how to approach foreign policy because, unlike some of the other people, I at least have a foreign policy philosophy, which is an extension of the Reagan philosophy. quote: Few men during their lifetime comes anywhere near exhausting the resources dwelling within them. There are deep wells of strength that are never used.

quote: I count life just a stuff to try the soul's strength on.

quote: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.

quote: It is not good to see people who have been pretending strength all their lives lose it even for a minute.

quote: The more equality women have, the fairer, more civilized and tolerant society will be. Sexual equality is a lot more effective against terrorism than military strength.

quote: I want to exude strength and intelligence.

quote: Brain power improves by brain use, just as our bodily strength grows with exercise. And there is no doubt that a large proportion of the female population, from school days to late middle age, now have very complicated lives indeed.
name: A. N. Wilson

quote: Humble souls are fearful of their own strength.

quote: I'm not sure I have the physical strength to undertake a novel.

quote: All too often miners, and indeed other trade unionists, underestimate the economic strength they have.

quote: There's a feeling that strength is determined by the size of a union. That clearly is nonsense.

quote: Above all, it is not decency or goodness of gentleness that impresses the Middle East, but strength.

quote: The type of cuisine I do, especially after being on 'Iron Chef' for several years, is a lot of global cuisine. quote: I want kids to understand that strength doesn't come from what goes on around you. It comes from inside you, and that comes from Jesus Christ.
name: Willie Aames

quote: To achieve lasting literature, fictional or factual, a writer needs perceptive vision, absorptive capacity, and creative strength.

quote: Let us face it: in the world today, money and economic strength remain more powerful arguments than the number of people you represent.

quote: There's a kind of a fundamental irresponsibility in playwriting, and the strength of playwriting comes from that irresponsibility.

quote: My opinion, my conviction, gains immensely in strength and sureness the minute a second mind as adopted it.

quote: I also wanted to express the strength of cinema to hide reality, while being entertaining. Cinema can fill in the empty spaces of your life and your loneliness.

quote: So many older people, they just sit around all day long and they don't get any exercise. Their muscles atrophy, and they lose their strength, their energy and vitality by inactivity.
name: Jack LaLanne

quote: I've come to the conclusion that beautiful women in the West aren't comfortable finding strength in their femininity. They want to do masculine-oriented things to establish their femininity. It's a contradiction.

quote: My greatest strength as a child, I realize now, was my imagination. While every other kid was reading and writing, I had seven whole hours a day to practice my imagination. When do you get that space in your life, ever?

name: Barbara Corcoran

quote: He knows not his own strength that has not met adversity.
name: Ben Jonson

quote: I exercise every morning. I do light weights - 5lb and 10lb arm exercises - and then lie and lift my arms and legs. It's all about keeping core strength. I do a lot of stretching too.

quote: You have to get along with people, but you also have to recognize that the strength of a team is different people with different perspectives and different personalities.

quote: My faith isn't very churchy, it's a pretty personal, intimate thing and has been a huge source of strength in moments of life and death.

quote: One killer exercise that's really great is pull-ups with your legs out level. That's my favourite. It's such functional core strength, and that's why I can climb up trees and down vines.

quote: My faith is an important part of my life and over the years I've learnt that it takes a proud man to say he doesn't need anything. It has been a quiet strength and a backbone through a lot of difficult times.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: I'm coming from a place of total strength and humility now.
name: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: I don't think a woman has to act like a man to show that she has strength.

quote: Our very strength as lesbians lies in the fact that we are outside of patriarchy our existence challenges its life.
name: Charlotte Bunch

quote: I feel my heart break to see a nation ripped apart by it's own greatest strength - it's diversity.

quote: I know what my limitations are as an actor, but my strength is putting myself into a well-written part. When I get in trouble is when I have to fix it, or when I have to carry it on personality.

quote: I have behind me not only the splendid traditions and the annals of more than a thousand years but the living strength and majesty of the Commonwealth and Empire of societies old and new of lands and races different in history and origins but all, by God's Will, united in spirit and in aim.

quote: Zealous men are ever displaying to you the strength of their belief, while judicious men are showing you the grounds of it.

quote: So Europe needs to be competitive and we also need to be competitive if we wish to remain an interesting economic partner for the United States. This has to be done on the basis of strength, of competitiveness.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: As much as I value an union of all the states, I would not admit the southern states into the union, unless they agreed to the discontinuance of this disgraceful trade, because it would bring weakness and not strength to the union.
name: George Mason

quote: I find, in being black, a thing of beauty: a joy a strength a secret cup of gladness.
name: Ossie Davis

quote: But if our nation goes over a financial Niagara, we won't have much strength and, eventually, we won't have peace. We are currently borrowing the entire defense budget from foreign investors. Within a few years, we will be spending more on interest payments than on national security. That is not, as our military friends say, a 'robust strategy.'
name: Mitch Daniels

quote: If our nation goes over a financial Niagara, we won't have much strength and, eventually, we won't have peace. We are currently borrowing the entire defense budget from foreign investors.
